title: Uncharted Movie Trailer Reactions
description:
Tim, Andy, Blessing, and Tamoor react to the trailer for the live-action Uncharted film from PlayStation Productions.

Follow Tam: https://twitter.com/tamoorh

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
